original_text:
They are driven out from human company;
    they shout after them as after a thief.
korean_text: 무리가 그들에게 소리를 지름으로 도둑 같이 사람들 가운데에서 쫓겨나서

sentences.original_text: They are driven out from human company
they shout after them as after a thief.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그들을 마치 도둑을 뒤쫓듯이 소리칩니다.
